articles.title: Celtics go cold again, fall to Cade Cunningham and top-seed Pistons: 7 takeaways
articles.description:
As a team, the Celtics finished 10-for-39 and went 1-for-18 from deep in the second and third as the Pistons built a four-point advantage going into the fourth.

The post Celtics go cold again, fall to Cade Cunningham and top-seed Pistons: 7 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
